attributes.action: Introduce universal free school meals to all school students.
attributes.additional_details: This will help reduce the pressure on people hurt by the pandemic, and long term with reduced problems of malnutrition and obesity. This will help the health overall health of the nation, improve grades by letting kids concentrate, and reduce pressure on the NHS. All children deserve healthy food.
attributes.background: Have all students in primary and secondary education be provided the option of healthy school meals.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331994
